sentence: Mohammed  Abu  Rizzeq  lost  more  than  his  house,  his  wife  was  killed  in  an  Israeli  bombardment  after  they  were  displaced.

sentence: More  than  33,000  Gazans  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  offensive  in  Gaza,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says,  the  majority  of  them  civilians.

article_title: Gazans return to devastation in Khan Younis
sentence: The  war  was  sparked  when  Hamas  attacked  southern  Israeli  border  communities  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  hostage.
